label: STEAM_COLOR_RED()
detail: Function (# ifndef ISTEAMPS3OVERLAYRENDERER_H # define ISTEAMPS3OVERLAYRENDERER_H # ifdef _WIN32 # pragma once # endif # include " cell / pad . h " enum EOverlayGradientDirection { k_EOverlayGradientHorizontal = 1,k_EOverlayGradientVertical = 2,k_EOverlayGradientNone = 3,} ; # define)
